Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the presence of Chinese tourists on the Indian side of Pangong Tso lake.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough evidence or support to prove the presence of Chinese tourists on the Indian side.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video shared by Congress members shows Chinese tourists, without providing substantial proof.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation by stating that the video was shot on the China-controlled portion of the lake, suggesting that the individuals in the video are not Chinese tourists on the Indian side.
